author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
RELIGION

The Pentecostal Mission: Annual convention and divine healing service, 9.30 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Kasthuri Sreenivasan Trust : Coimbatore Artists Meet 2016 series and 145{+t}{+h}painting exhibition by T. Mathiniraiselvan, Kasthuri Sreenivasan Art Gallery, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Ranganathan Polytechnic College: NSS special camp, Ikkarai Boluvampatti Village,

6 a.m.

Sree Saraswathi Thyagaraja College: Campus drive by WIPRO Limited, 9 a.m.

GEM Hospital: Laparoscopic colorectal surgery training programme, 9 a.m.

AJK College of Arts and Science: Inter-collegiate cultural fest ZEBICOM 2K16,

9.30 a.m.

Karunya University: 4{+t}{+h}symposium on Shock Waves (NSSW-4), 9.30 a.m.

Tamilnadu College of Engineering: Intercollegiate management meet M-FEST 2016, 9.30 a.m.

EASA College of Engineering and Technology: Technical symposium Erectus’ 16, 9.30 a.m.

Bishop Appasamy College of Arts and Science: Seminar on financial planning initiated by SEBI, 10 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Kaolin short film fest 2016, 10 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Productivity Conclave – 2016, ‘Make In India’ Opportunities and Challenges, Hotel The Residency, 10 a.m.

G.R. Damodaran Academy of Management: Conference, 10 a.m.

Hindusthan College of Arts and Science: Inaugural of Meraki 2k16, 10 a.m.

Sankara Institute of Management Studies and Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development: Workshop on Awareness of Reproductive Health Issues and its Impact on Academic Performance of Adolescent Girls, 10 a.m.

Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology: Students convention AUTOZINIOS V5.0, 10 a.m.

AITUC: 41{+s}{+t}session of All India Trade Union Congress, Ayisha Mahal Campus, Kuniyamuthur, 10.30 a.m.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce: Guest lecture on capital markets, 1.30 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Entrepreneurship week on “Innovative Ideas for a Better World”, 1.45 p.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts and Science College, Mettupalayam: Computer science department association meeting, 2.30 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Institute of Technology: Valediction of regional level project exhibition SRIT Explore 2016, 3.45 p.m.

Dr. Dasarathan International School: 6{+t}{+h}Founder’s Day 4.30 p.m.

Medical Fraternity of Coimbatore Region and Committee of Hosts: Award ceremony, Hotel Le-Meridien, 5.30 p.m.

TIRUPUR

NIFT-TEA College of Knitwear Fashion: Free eye check-up camp, 9.30 a.m.

PALLADAM

SCAD Institute of Technology: Campus interview, 9 a.m.
title: Coimbatore Today
